metadata.name: Precision Timer Challenge
metadata.description: Players try to stop a countdown as close to zero as possible.

defaults.title: Precision Timer Challenge
defaults.subtitle: Stop the countdown at the perfect moment
defaults.description: Players start a five-second countdown and try to stop it as close to zero as possible.

fields.name: title
fields.label: Game title
fields.description: Headline displayed at the top of the countdown screen.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.label: Subtitle
fields.description: Optional subheading reinforcing the campaign message.

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.description: Supporting copy that explains how the challenge works.

fields.name: countdownSeconds
fields.label: Countdown duration (seconds)
fields.description: Number of seconds the countdown should run before players try to stop it.

fields.name: startButtonLabel
fields.label: Start button label
fields.description: Text displayed on the button that begins the countdown.

fields.name: stopButtonLabel
fields.label: Stop button label
fields.description: Text displayed on the button that submits the player's attempt.

fields.name: submissionEndpoint
fields.label: Submission endpoint
fields.description: API endpoint that records the player's timing attempt once the game ends.
